• At the end of the first visit, it should be clear who qualifies for BANC and who needs further assessment.
o T he woman should be given a date for follow-up and told where that will be.
• A Basic Antenatal Care plus schedule of 7 follow-up visits (8 visits in total) is provided for women without any
risk factors.
